EN.general: I  <br> hereby consent to authorize Medeor 24x7 Hospital, its working physicians and its health professionals to render all medical care to myself or to my dependent, including Physical Examinations, Radiology Examinations, Laboratory tests, Blood and blood products, Injections and /or administration of pharmaceutical products / Medications, use of local anesthetics and other invasive procedures as necessary or advisable in the judgement of the hospital?s physicians and health professionals. I have not been given any guarantees to the results of the services I will receive.
